alert.note: Alert for Blue Earth; Faribault; Freeborn; Nicollet; Renville; Sibley; Steele; Waseca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 14 at 12:18AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of central Minnesota and south central Minnesota, including the following counties, in central Minnesota, Renville and Sibley. In south central Minnesota, Blue Earth, Faribault, Freeborn, Nicollet, Steele and Waseca. * WHEN...Until 1 PM this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. Extensive street flooding is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Moderate to occasional heavy rain will continue through the morning. An additional 1 to 2 inches on top of the 2 to 5 inches that have fallen in the last 24 hours could lead to flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Blue Earth; Faribault; Freeborn; Nicollet; Renville; Sibley; Steele; Waseca
